pages.text: Basenjis are an ancient breed originally used for hunting in Africa, specifically in areas such as the Congo.$(br2)Standing over half a block tall, these sharp-eyed dogs come in three coats.
Basenjis are found most commonly in deserts, swamps, and savannas. You can also find them around savanna plateaus and jungles, and more rarely badlands.
pages.title: Location
Taming
pages.text: These dogs can be tamed with a Bacon or Chicken Treat.
